label.description: The category or title shown in the popover header / margin note.

text.description: The main body text for the popover.

stat.description: Optional high-impact statistic shown in large display type.

img.description: Path to a single image asset (relative to public directory). Use 'media' for videos or multiple items.

media.description: Ordered list of image or video paths for a carousel. Images must start with /images/, videos with /media/.

link.description: Internal or external URL. Requires 'linkText' to be present.

linkText.description: Label for the link button. Required when 'link' is present.
